duties_responsibilities.duty: Analyze and report on marketing tests across owned marketing channels and experiences.
Manage and upgrade interactive dashboards, reports, and presentations to communicate key insights and performance metrics to stakeholders.
Design and measure A/B tests following standard testing methodologies.
Convey data insights to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
Play a pivotal role in delivering the global digital marketing strategy.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in marketing, business, statistics, or a related field.
